document_data.name: Arvold
document_data.mainbody:
'''Arvold''' was a seaman and the sailmender for the ''[[Storm Sprite]]'' for a time during the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Ah, [[Umberlee]] take you!}}
document_data.Description: He had a strong look about his face, with a prominent nose and dark eyes that readily gave away his severe outlook on life.
document_data.Personality: Arvold saw the world in harsh terms and would easily abandon, seek recompense from, or even violence against, anyone that got in the way of his survival at sea.
document_data.Abilities: He was quite skill at his work, but had a proclivity for taking things that did not belong to him.
document_data.History: Arvold was aboard the ''Storm Sprite'' in the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, when it was destroyed at sea following an encounter with the [[dracolich]] [[Hethcypressarvil]] in the seas of the [[Dragonmere]]. He managed to survive the assault, along with the ship's captain [[Fowler]], and the [[sorceress]] Ruha. The trio were stranded at sea for a short time, After being passage to the coastal town of [[Pros]], they were granted safe haven by the [[Maces of Elversult]] and the city's Lady Constable, [[Vaerana Hawklyn]].
